title: Bernie Mireault - Mackenzie Queen (Restored)
description:
Issues 1-5 of 'Mackenzie Queen'

Matrix Graphic Series, 1985-1986, each issue 36-44 pages

Written and Illustrated by Bernie Mireault

(With a short back-up story or pages by some other people here and there. Stephen Bissette does a couple covers.)

Although the title suggests otherwise, the story is actually science fiction, reminiscent of A Hitchiker's Guide to the Galaxy. Mackenize Queen is chosen by Ã¢â‚¬Å“the brotherhoodÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ to save the world against the Ice Men who, having destroyed their own planet, would take Earth for themselves. Queen is assisted by an seven-foot tall alien called Ududu, who is a friendly carnivore and who also provides much of the comic relief for the story.
